snippet: Russell Branyan, 36, agreed to a minor league contract with the Yankees and will try to win a bench job as a corner infielder during spring training.
abstract: New York Yankees sign infielder Russell Branyan to a minor league contract; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Russell Branyan, 36, agreed to a minor league contract with the Yankees and will try to win a bench job as a corner infielder during spring training.
